content:
<@&865071201478901820> 

IP: **75.154.177.46**

Enter this IP in your Steam -> View -> Servers -> Favourites tab using the "Add Server" button, then join the server in game by going to Join Ark menu, and changing the list filter to favourites.

The server password is **"orangejuice"**

Map is **Crystal Isles**, so make sure you have it installed. We've chosen our start spawnpoint as **Central**.

**Mods List:**
Cross-Genesis 2
Castles, Keeps and Forts Remastered
Kibble Table
Classic Flyers
Cross Aberation
HG Stacking Mod 10000-90 V312
Utilites Plus (Mod ID: 899250777)
Platforms Plus (Open Source)
Super Stacks Mod
Aberration Items for Other Maps (Mod ID: 1362432911)
Fire Unicorn
Structures Plus (S+)
